scripts.bundle: npm run bundle:css && npm run bundle:js
scripts.postcss: npm run compile:scss && postcss Resources/CSS/style.css -o Resources/CSS/style.css
scripts.bundle:css: npm run compile:scss && postcss Resources/CSS/style.css | cleancss -o Resources/CSS/style.min.css
scripts.bundle:js: npm run compile:ts && uglifyjs -o Resources/JS/app.js -c -m -- Resources/JS/app.js
scripts.watch: npm run watch:scss | npm run watch:ts
scripts.watch:scss: npm run compile:scss && npm run compile:scss -- -w
